texts.0: This is the sidebar navigation. You will be able to go back to the homepage, search for ANYTHING on the site, access the chat, profile, settings menu, and log out.
texts.1: This is the site header, where you can view your current route, notifications, and help center.
texts.2: Here you can search for and create new teams. You can also view the teams you are part of.
texts.3: Quick access to view ALL your tasks, with the ability to search and filter by status and date.
texts.4: By clicking on the team card, you will be redirected to the team page and have access to the projects.
texts.5: On the team screen, you can search for and create new projects, as well as view the projects you are part of.
texts.6: Quick access to view ONLY the tasks of that team, with the ability to search and filter by status and date.
texts.7: By clicking on the project card, you will be redirected to the project page and have access to the project tasks.
texts.8: Here you will have access to 4 task view options, you can choose from wall, list, calendar, or kanban.
texts.9: Here you can create properties that will be used in tasks and projects, as well as edit them and manage status.
texts.title: Explore Vertex and discover how to manage your time from end to end!

landing-page.ABOUT_US_DESCRIPTION: Vertex is an innovative task and project management platform designed to optimize productivity and collaboration in teams of all sizes. With an intuitive interface and comprehensive features, Vertex allows you to organize, track, and complete your projects efficiently and effectively.
landing-page.TUTORIAL_DESCRIPTION: Unraveling the secrets of task and project management is essential to drive your team's success, and Vertex is here to guide you on this exciting journey. In our video tutorial, dive into the powerful functionalities of this cutting-edge platform, designed to elevate your productivity and efficiency to unprecedented levels. Get ready for an immersive experience that will transform your approach to work, empowering you to master every aspect of your workflow with confidence and mastery.
landing-page.MISSION_DESCRIPTION: Facilitating project and task management by providing users with an intuitive and secure platform to organize their personal and professional routines. Our goal is to promote efficiency, collaboration, and transparency, making the management process more accessible and effective for individuals and teams.
landing-page.EXCELLENCE_DESCRIPTION: Commitment to quality and excellence in everything we do, always seeking to exceed user expectations.
landing-page.INTEGRITY_DESCRIPTION: Acting with transparency, honesty, and ethics in all our interactions, maintaining the trust of our customers and collaborators.
landing-page.INNOVATION_DESCRIPTION: Continuously seeking new solutions and technologies to improve our platform and provide an exceptional experience to users.
landing-page.VISION_DESCRIPTION: To be recognized as the leading project and task management software, offering a comprehensive and customizable solution that meets the diverse needs of users. We constantly pursue innovation and improvement, aiming to be the reference in management tools for the business and individual community.
landing-page.MANAGE_TIME: Manage Your Time End to End
landing-page.TIME_TRACKING_DESC:
Allows team members to track time spent on specific project tasks.
 Users can start, pause, and stop the timer to accurately record time spent on each activity.
landing-page.ASSIGN_TIME_TO_TASKS_DESC:
Automatically associates recorded time with specific tasks or subtasks within the project.
 Facilitates identification of activities consuming more time and optimizes resource allocation.
landing-page.DATA_VISUALIZATION_DESC:
Provides detailed reports on time spent on different tasks, projects, or by team members.
 Graphs and tables offer a clear view of total time spent, average time per task, and variations over time.
landing-page.TASK_REVIEW_DESC:
Allows team members to review and evaluate tasks assigned to them or other team members.
 Reviewers can provide specific feedback on progress, quality, and task compliance with project requirements.
landing-page.EFFICIENT_COLLABORATION_DESC:
Facilitates communication among team members, allowing them to share comments, suggestions, and corrections directly on reviewed tasks.
 Promotes transparency and collaboration by providing a centralized platform to discuss and resolve task-related issues.
landing-page.QUALITY_VALIDATION_DESC:
Helps ensure the quality of work performed by the team by providing an opportunity to identify and correct errors, inconsistencies, or gaps in tasks.
 Assists in compliance with quality standards and best practices established by the project or organization.
landing-page.REAL_TIME_COMMUNICATION_DESC:
Allows team members to communicate instantly with each other, regardless of geographic location.
 Facilitates real-time exchange of information, updates, and important discussions.
landing-page.INTEGRATED_CHAT_DESC:
Facilitates communication among team members with an integrated chat on each project task.
 Allows users to discuss details, share files, and resolve issues directly on the platform.

teams.title: Teams
teams.description: Teams are workspaces where you can manage projects, invite members, start chat conversations, and have your time and your team's time at your fingertips.

allTasks.title: All Tasks
allTasks.description: In this section, you can view all tasks for which you are responsible across the system, tasks from all teams and projects.

projects.description1: Projects are the different workspaces of a team, where you can segment subjects and organize your and/or team's tasks.

projects.title: View / Create projects

tasks.description: All project tasks will be centralized here, you can filter, sort, and create new tasks. Managing your time and recording each stage.
